EmailTemplate.description: Sent to participants to take LAMP Survey.
EmailTemplate.name: LAMP Class Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback Requested | Learning Account Management Process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Feedback Is Important!
We hope you enjoyed the Large Account Management Process (LAMP) Training on {!Case.Class_Start_Date_del__c}. It is our goal to ensure the Global Sales Training Team delivers world class training programs.
In order to continue to improve our programs and meet the needs of our growing sales force, we are asking you to answer a brief survey based on your experience.
https://wex.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_9oFtEkWk6uhiy8d
Please email Sales Training with any questions.
Thank you,
The Global Sales Training Team
